# Key Differences in Mining Station 14
- Spacing in this sector is significantly more deadly.
- Generators require fuel to produce power.
- Electrical equipment produce heat, which must be dealt with to prevent machine overheating and failure.
- Unsafe mining practices may lead to mining collapses ("cave-ins"). See the guide to [color=#a4885c]Mining Safety[/color].
- Many more items are available for purchase from the cargo catalog.
